Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 24 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 24 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,0 00 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAY HEY KID settled early on the inside, angled out three wide on the far turn, gained a clear lead in the stretch and remained safe late late under firm handling. GILES was allowed to settle early, angled out four wide in the stretch, finished well and was second best. NOBLE BEHAVIOR pressed the pace until the top of the stretch, then weakened . KING OF THE RING set a pressured pace for three quarters, the tired in the lane. LEOMBRUNO raced close up on the inside for three quarters, then gave way. FU ROO had brief foot and dropped back.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: RAVEN MOON stumbled soon after the start, tracked three wide down the backside, rallied in the stretch four wide and drew off late under strong handling. INTO GOLD set the pace and dueled on the lead, was no match for the winner late but held place. BEAT THE DEALER dueled on the lead and weakened slightly in the stretch.
